instructions: Open the screen that you want to capture. Press the Power button for a few seconds. Then tap Screenshot. If that doesn't work, press and hold the Power and Volume down buttons at the same time for a few seconds. Your phone will take a picture of the screen and save it. At the top of the screen, you'll see Screenshot capture .
Swipe down from the top of a screen with the Screenshot capture . Tap the "Screenshot saved" notification.
Open your phone's Photos app . Tap Menu . Tap Device folders and then Screenshots .
View it in your phone's Photos app . Tap Edit .
